answers.b: Requires application of a negative potential to make the reaction occur

explanations.a: Correct, but not complete. This is part of the characteristics of an electrolytic cell.
explanations.b: Correct, but not complete. A negative potential is required to drive the reaction.
explanations.c: Partially true, but not the complete defining feature.
explanations.d: Correct. All options A and B are true for an electrolytic cell.

questions.question: If we pass a current of 10.0 Amperes through a solution for 1 hour, how many moles of electrons are used?

explanations.a: Correct. Charge in coulombs divided by Faradayâ€™s constant gives moles of electrons.
explanations.b: Incorrect. This gives the charge in coulombs, not the moles.
explanations.c: Incorrect. This would give an incorrect and large value.
explanations.d: Incorrect. This gives the total ampere-hours, not moles.
